00041 typedef enum {
00042         GP_FILE_INFO_NONE            = 0,
00043         GP_FILE_INFO_TYPE            = 1 << 0,
00044         GP_FILE_INFO_NAME            = 1 << 1,
00045         GP_FILE_INFO_SIZE            = 1 << 2,
00046         GP_FILE_INFO_WIDTH           = 1 << 3,
00047         GP_FILE_INFO_HEIGHT          = 1 << 4,
00048         GP_FILE_INFO_PERMISSIONS     = 1 << 5,
00049         GP_FILE_INFO_STATUS          = 1 << 6,
00050         GP_FILE_INFO_MTIME           = 1 << 7,
00051         GP_FILE_INFO_ALL             = 0xFF
00052 } CameraFileInfoFields;
00053 
00054 typedef enum {
00055         GP_FILE_PERM_NONE       = 0,
00056         GP_FILE_PERM_READ       = 1 << 0,
00057         GP_FILE_PERM_DELETE     = 1 << 1,
00058         GP_FILE_PERM_ALL        = 0xFF
00059 } CameraFilePermissions;
00060 
00061 typedef enum {
00062         GP_FILE_STATUS_NOT_DOWNLOADED,
00063         GP_FILE_STATUS_DOWNLOADED
00064 } CameraFileStatus;
00065 
00066 typedef struct _CameraFileInfoFile CameraFileInfoFile;
00067 struct _CameraFileInfoFile {
00068         CameraFileInfoFields fields;
00069         CameraFileStatus status;
00070         unsigned long size;
00071         char type[64];
00072 
00073         unsigned int width, height;
00074         char name[64];
00075         CameraFilePermissions permissions;
00076         time_t mtime;
00077 };
00078

00080 struct _CameraFileInfoPreview {
00081         CameraFileInfoFields fields;
00082         CameraFileStatus status;
00083         unsigned long size;
00084         char type[64];
00085 
00086         unsigned int width, height;
00087 };

00094         char type[64];
00095 };

00101         CameraFileInfoAudio   audio;
